name: ノイズ
message: "Fucking noobs, wasting my time. What a joke."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Then why didn't you help me earlier! Maybe then Ren wouldn't have―"
I pull Ren out of my bag and hug him.
Relieved, I stroke Ren's head and return him to my bag.

name: ノイズ
message: "The fuck is wrong with you? It's just a machine."

name: ノイズ
message: "You really are a moron. Worry about yourself, not your fucking machine."

name: ノイズ
message: "That ganker killed the damage limiter. If even one hit had landed, we wouldn't be talking right now."

name: ノイズ
message: "Cornered and didn't do shit... I guess you weren't lying. You really don't remember."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Don't tell me that's why you just stood there and watched."
Just as my anger is about to explode―

name: 蒼葉
message: "I told you before, right? I got some 'game' that just plays itself."

name: 蒼葉
message: "But do you think we could get into Platinum Jail with this invitation thing?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Invitation? I didn't get anything like that."

name: ノイズ
message: "I thought it might be a prank at first, but maybe it's legit. The game's been modified, though."

name: ノイズ
message: "I've played it before. It never had a scene like that."
As usual, the game made no sense at all.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...The same thing happened when Granny was kidnapped."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What happened in the game happened in real life. What if this one's another prediction?"

name: ノイズ
message: "If you're right about that, it's obviously a trap. That'd mean they announced they were gonna kidnap her in advance, right?"
But even if it is a trap, it has to mean something.
A cave, a treasure chest, a key, a door...
There's an image attached. A map of the Old Residential District.
A spot is marked in red on the left edge of the wall surrounding Platinum Jail.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I need to meet up with Mr. Haga."

name: ノイズ
message: "I'm going too. Can't have you dying before our rematch."
Though I'm not exactly happy about it, we head for Platinum Jail together.
